item.title: Apple Releases visionOS 2.6
item.description: Apple today released visionOS 2.6, the sixth update to the visionOS 2 operating system that came out in September. visionOS 2.6 comes two months after the launch of visionOS 2.5. visionOS 2.6 can be d
